title: YOU TOO?
lyrics:
Lyric SNAZZY - 너도? (YOU TOO?)

[Romanization]

bamhaneure byeoldeuri malhaejwo nae gamjeongi eotteonji
ige jeongmal sarangi matneunji geujeo kkuminji

neoreul bomyeon modeun ge meomchwo
Like a movie scene you are all I know
hyeonsirinji kkuminji molla
Tell me is this love or just a show?

naega neukkineun i gamjeongeun
ummyeongcheoreom dagaon kkeullimeun
It feels like fate

Lost in you no way
Here with you I wanna stay
Lost in time no trace
Forever caught in your embrace

Stay with me I need you, baby
Take my hand don’t let it sway me
In your love I’m never lazy
Love me now don’t make it hazy

naege hwaksineul jwo nareul makjineun mothal geol
ireon nae maeumeun hwaksilhageodeun
hoksirado nawa gateun mami deureotdamyeon
If you’re sure just say so Don’t let me go
neoui sarangeul jwo naegedo
If you're sure watch it grow
nal hyanghan maeumi keojyeogal geoya

Your smile it lights my way
With you I’d choose to stay
miruji aneullae neol hyanghan sarangeul

Loving me truly be free now
maeil barabolge neoman
modeun sunggan neowa hamkke

Lost in you no way
Here with you I wanna stay
Lost in time no trace
Forever caught in your embrace

Stay with me I need you baby
Take my hand don’t let it sway me
In your love I’m never lazy
Love me now don’t make it hazy

[Hangeul]

밤하늘에 별들이 말해줘 내 감정이 어떤지

이게 정말 사랑이 맞는지 그저 꿈인지



너를 보면 모든 게 멈춰

Like a movie scene you are all I know

현실인지 꿈인지 몰라

Tell me is this love or just a show?


내가 느끼는 이 감정은

운명처럼 다가온 끌림은

It feels like fate



Lost in you no way

Here with you I wanna stay

Lost in time no trace

Forever caught in your embrace



Stay with me I need you, baby

Take my hand don’t let it sway me

In your love I’m never lazy

Love me now don’t make it hazy



내게 확신을 줘 나를 막지는 못할 걸

이런 내 마음은 확실하거든

혹시라도 나와 같은 맘이 들었다면

If you’re sure just say so Don’t let me go

너의 사랑을 줘 내게도

If you're sure watch it grow

날 향한 마음이 커져갈 거야



Your smile it lights my way

With you I’d choose to stay

미루지 않을래 널 향한 사랑을



Loving me truly be free now

매일 바라볼게 너만

모든 순간 너와 함께



Lost in you no way

Here with you I wanna stay

Lost in time no trace

Forever caught in your embrace



Stay with me I need you baby

Take my hand don’t let it sway me

In your love I’m never lazy

Love me now don’t make it hazy
name: SNAZZY - 너도? (YOU TOO?)
